attributes.action: Encourage officials to invest in brief cases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the expenses that officials can claim, I find it worrying that all too many of them still display secret documents in public for photographers rather than invest in a brief case.

Secret documents must remain secret, and brief cases are essential in this respect. Prime Minister, the British Public would not object if Ministers, Members and other officials claimed for a brief case on expenses.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
